attributes.title: Trump in a grave 2020
attributes.review: Trump is a racist and a rApist and shouldn’t be here, NO TRUMP 2020 🤡🙈

attributes.title: Omg babygirl don’t download ! 😭😭
attributes.review: So what had happened was I went on the app and Trump came and said u better vote me or I will kidnap you and then he said he was getting rid of chic fil a so then I deleted it . So here I am writing this review .

attributes.title: Worst app
attributes.review: Thought I would cave and download this app. Turned out to the be worst app in the App Store. So many technical issues, it’s constantly freezing and restarting. It’s also just so aesthetically unpleasing. I actually got sick after being on this app. Thanks a lot trump!

attributes.title: This app was horrible
attributes.review: I originally got this app because a guy on TikTok said it was a support Obama app 🥺😌. However, I downloaded it and it was a LIE. IT WAS A CAMPAIGN FOR A CHEETO-PUFF. Please beware, so that your children do not get on this app. While you’re at it, if you know anybody who values human rights then PLEASE tell them not to get this. I clicked on this app and it was screaming “misogynist, homophobic, transphobic, islamophobic, all lives matter,” and stuff like that. If I could give this app less than one star, then I would.

attributes.title: This app is a waste of time, glitches all the time
attributes.review: Don’t even consider downloading this app. It’s a waste of time and you might as well throw your phone away if you download this.

attributes.title: App has so many bugs!
attributes.review: This app does not work what so ever!!! It’s constantly crashing and has given me a virus about two times already! I do not suggest anyone downloads this app.

attributes.title: I wanted to see her anger level.
++!**scarring*+!:🦋🦋
attributes.review: i downloaded the app thinking i would see the trumpets beautiful family and opened the app just to see his 🍤. it was so small the app crashed because it couldn’t render the size. i later found my camera roll berated with the 🍤. i’m now going to need counseling for the rest of my life because of this hot cheeto of a man.

attributes.title: Would’ve given 0 stars if it was an option
attributes.review: I recently downloaded this app to see the news on Donald Trump, and honestly this app has got to be the worst app I have ever downloaded. As soon as I got on, my phone automatically crashed. When I went back on later, it kept on glitching me out. It was so bad that it deserves zero stars, but since I’m unable to give it zero stars, one will have to do.
